thread.title: Cleveland Browns vs. St. Louis Rams: Bold predictions for Week 7 (Video)
thread.title_full: Cleveland Browns vs. St. Louis Rams: Bold predictions for Week 7 (Video) | cleveland.com

author: Chris Fedor, Northeast Ohio Media Group
title: Cleveland Browns vs. St. Louis Rams: Bold predictions for Week 7 (Video)
text:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- The Cleveland Browns will try to bounce back from their most recent loss when they travel to St. Louis to play the tough and physical Rams Sunday.
This week was another in Berea with plenty of conversation about topics other than the upcoming game. Backup quarterback Johnny Manziel stole the headlines after another off-the-field incident, and a number of people questioned how head coach Mike Pettine handled this most recent issue.
During our Browns show, Dan Labbe, Bud Shaw, Michael Reghi and I gave our predictions for this week and the remainder of the season.
Will Manziel stay in Cleveland beyond this season? Will his baggage eventually cost him his backup job? Will a wide receiver besides Travis Benjamin catch a touchdown pass?
You can watch the video above.
